verses.verse: Then Eliphaz <WH464> the Temanite <WH8489> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
If we assay <WH5254> <WH8765> to commune <WH1697> with thee, wilt thou be grieved <WH3811> <WH8799>? but who can <WH3201> <WH8799> withhold <WH6113> <WH8800> himself from speaking <WH4405> ?
Behold, thou hast instructed <WH3256> <WH8765> many <WH7227>, and thou hast strengthened <WH2388> <WH8762> the weak <WH7504> hands <WH3027>.
Thy words <WH4405> have upholden <WH6965> <WH8686> him that was falling <WH3782> <WH8802>, and thou hast strengthened <WH553> <WH8762> the feeble <WH3766> <WH8802> knees <WH1290>.
But now it is come <WH935> <WH8799> upon thee, and thou faintest <WH3811> <WH8799>; it toucheth <WH5060> <WH8799> thee, and thou art troubled <WH926> <WH8735>.
Is not this thy fear <WH3374>, thy confidence <WH3690>, thy hope <WH8615>, and the uprightness <WH8537> of thy ways <WH1870> ?
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, I pray thee, who ever perished <WH6> <WH8804>, being innocent <WH5355>? or where <WH375> were the righteous <WH3477> cut off <WH3582> <WH8738> ?
Havahn as I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804>, they that plow <WH2790> <WH8802> iniquity <WH205>, and sow <WH2232> <WH8802> wickedness <WH5999>, reap <WH7114> <WH8799> the same.
By the blast <WH5397> of 'Elohim <WH433> they perish <WH6> <WH8799>, and by the breath <WH7307> of his nostrils <WH639> are they consumed <WH3615> <WH8799>.
The roaring <WH7581> of the lion <WH738>, and the voice <WH6963> of the fierce lion <WH7826>, and the teeth <WH8127> of the young lions <WH3715>, are broken <WH5421> <WH8738>.
The old lion <WH3918> perisheth <WH6> <WH8802> for lack <WH1097> of prey <WH2964>, and the stout lion's <WH3833> whelps <WH1121> are scattered abroad <WH6504> <WH8691>.
Now a thing <WH1697> was secretly brought <WH1589> <WH8792> to me, and mine ear <WH241> received <WH3947> <WH8799> a little <WH8102> thereof.
In thoughts <WH5587> from the visions <WH2384> of the night <WH3915>, when deep sleep <WH8639> falleth <WH5307> <WH8800> on men <WH582>,
Fear <WH6343> came <WH7122> <WH8804> upon me, and trembling <WH7461>, which made all <WH7230> my bones <WH6106> to shake <WH6342> <WH8689>.
Then a spirit <WH7307> passed <WH2498> <WH8799> before my face <WH6440>; the hair <WH8185> of my flesh <WH1320> stood up <WH5568> <WH8762>:

It stood still <WH5975> <WH8799>, but I could not discern <WH5234> <WH8686> the form <WH4758> thereof: an image <WH8544> was before mine eyes <WH5869>, there was silence <WH1827>, and I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> a voice <WH6963>, saying,
Shall mortal man <WH582> be more just <WH6663> <WH8799> than 'Elohim <WH433>? shall a man <WH1397> be more pure <WH2891> <WH8799> than his maker <WH6213> <WH8802> ?
Behold, he put no trust <WH539> <WH8686> in his servants <WH5650>; and his angels <WH4397> he charged <WH7760> <WH8799> with folly <WH8417>:

How much less <WH637> in them that dwell <WH7931> <WH8802> in houses <WH1004> of clay <WH2563>, whose foundation <WH3247> is in the dust <WH6083>, which are crushed <WH1792> <WH8762> before <WH6440> the moth <WH6211> ?
They are destroyed <WH3807> <WH8714> from morning <WH1242> to evening <WH6153>: they perish <WH6> <WH8799> for ever <WH5331> without any regarding <WH7760> <WH8688> it.
Doth not their excellency <WH3499> which is in them go away <WH5265> <WH8738>? they die <WH4191> <WH8799>, even without wisdom <WH2451>.
